question: Which region was stormed and captured on D-Day (June 6, 1944) by the Canadian troops?
main_question: Which region was stormed and captured on D-Day (June 6, 1944) by the Canadian troops?
explanatory_sentence: In the epic invasion of Normandy in northern France on June 6, 1944, known as D-Day, 15,000 Canadian troops stormed and captured Juno Beach from the German Army, a great national achievement shown in this painting by Orville Fisher.
